function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unwillingness of mainstream medical establishment to engage with community-based approaches","Impact":"Lack of effective implementation of community-based approaches, limited community involvement, and reduced ability to address changes in vector-borne disease distribution and incidence","Mitigation":"Increase awareness and education within the medical establishment about the benefits of community-based approaches, foster collaboration between medical professionals and community stakeholders, and provide incentives for medical establishment engagement","Technologies":"Collaborative platforms for knowledge sharing, communication tools for stakeholder engagement, and data visualization tools for impact assessment","People":"Mainstream medical establishment, community stakeholders","Owner":"Health organizations, community leaders"},{"Description":"Issue of scale in community-based projects","Impact":"Limited localization of projects, capacity constraints, and potential dilution of successful approaches at large scales","Mitigation":"Develop capacity-building programs for communities, invest in skill development and training, empower decision-making at the local level, and promote a culture of collaboration and learning","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, remote collaboration tools, and data-driven decision support systems","People":"Community-based project coordinators, community members, policy makers","Owner":"NGOs, government agencies"},{"Description":"Unclear scalability of community-based approaches","Impact":"Difficulty in determining the scalability of successful community-based approaches, leading to challenges in addressing changes in vector-borne disease distribution and incidence","Mitigation":"Conduct pilot studies to assess scalability, develop flexible implementation frameworks, integrate community feedback into scalability planning, and establish clear criteria for successful scale-up","Technologies":"Scalability modeling and simulation tools, community feedback platforms, and decision support systems for scale-up planning","People":"Community-based project coordinators, scalability experts, health practitioners","Owner":"Research institutions, scalability experts"}]}
